input.name: testTitle
input.label: Override "Title"
input.help-text: Normally we use each content's displayName to generate the title tag, but if you want you can override it here on a per content basis.

input.name: testDescription
input.label: Override "Description"
input.help-text: Like with titles you can for each content set a custom description used for SEO. We try to extract this data automatically from suitable existing fields on this content, consult the Github readme for details.

input.name: testRobots
input.label: Hide from external search engines?
input.help-text: Checking this will tell external search engines to skip this particular page. Note: The page is not hidden and can still be accessed via URL or links, but search engines will try and not list it in their search results.
